PostProcessing::Effect

PostProcessing::Effect Class Reference

This class allows the post-processing manager to work with a list of effects; it also ensures that all effects are python objects. More...

#include <effect.hpp>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This class allows the post-processing manager to work with a list of effects; it also ensures that all effects are python objects.
